trends: There have been no other sightings in Beerwah
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: I saw an eggish oval shaped object that looked like it was on fire.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking home from school when i heard a sound similar to an airplane but more high-pitched and pulsating, i looked up and saw an eggish, oval shaped object that looked like it was on fire (it took me a while to locate because it was very high up). The UFO flew down some way before dropping a glowing object and then leaving as fast as it arrived, i tried to video it on my phone but it had appeared to have stopped working, i was able to turn my phone on after the UFO left. I searched for the object that the UFO dropped but all i found was an empty field. When i first saw the oject i thought it was a comet but its movements and the lack of parts breaking off it made me think twice. My first thoughts were "cool a comet" but then i figured it was a UFO so then i thought "cool a UFO" but after it left and i had some time to think about it, it scares me.
